content: SeedlyTV EP05 Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 23 May 2019Will retail apocalypse that affected US retail also affect Singapore Retail Reits sector? 3 shop units in CCK Lot One Shopping Mall remain empty for at least 3 months which never happened in the past.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 27 May 2019It really depends on the property mangement. Retail has not been easy and if you have notice, a lot of shopping malls change their strategy to have more eateries and restaurants in it. Retail shopping has been on a downward trend with the rising ecommerce industry. The big retail malls does not have much issue filling the space, the only concern are the smaller stratamalls that do not have as much foot fall.0 comments0
